arktsVersion_1_0.messageText: Using "this" inside stand-alone functions is not supported (arkts-no-standalone-this)
Object literals cannot be used as type declarations (arkts-no-obj-literals-as-types)

Object literals cannot be used as type declarations (arkts-no-obj-literals-as-types)
